name: The Silence
description:
Ever wanted to star in your own Hitchcock movie?

The Silence is the first part of a series of adventure games created in the style of famous directors.

Story:
You wake up in a cheap Motel with no recollection of who or where you are. You soon come to also realise that everyone has disappeared and the only sign of life is the distant calls of the crows in the wind.

It is up to you to piece together your identity and discover why everyone has vanished.

But perhaps some things are best not remembered.


This game will continue to evolve and grow via regular updates!
